TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit VoiceInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示已安裝的語音合成引擎。

span.span: Represents an installed speech synthesis engine.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdditionalInfo As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ AdditionalInfo { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得語音的其他相關資訊。

span.span: Gets additional information about the voice.

value.span: 傳回描述及識別語音的名稱/值組的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of name/value pairs that describe and identify the voice.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Age As VoiceAge
public: property System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge Age { System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the age of the voice.
Returns the age of the voice.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得屬於列舉，指出語音的年齡。The property gets a member of the enumeration that indicates the age of the voice.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Culture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the culture of the voice.

value.span: 傳回 物件，提供特定文化特性的相關資訊，例如文化特性名稱、書寫系統、使用的行事曆，以及如何格式化日期和排序字串。

span.span: Returns a object that provides information about a specific culture, such as the names of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會指定每個文化特性的唯一名稱。The class specifies a unique name for each culture. 名稱是與語言相關聯的 ISO 639 兩個字母小寫文化特性代碼和國家/地區或區域相關聯的 ISO 3166 兩個字母大寫子文化特性代碼的組合。The name is a combination of an ISO 639 two-letter lowercase culture code associated with a language and an ISO 3166 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region. 文化特性名稱的範例包括"es-US"西班牙文，在美國或"FR-CA"所說，在加拿大法文。Examples of culture names include "es-US" for Spanish as spoken in the US, or "fr-CA" for French as spoken in Canada. 您可以使用兩個字母小寫語言程式碼，以指定中性文化特性。You can specify a neutral culture by using only the two-digit lowercase language code. 例如，"fr"代表法文，指定中性文化特性和"de"德文指定中性文化特性。For example, "fr" specifies the neutral culture for French, and "de" specifies the neutral culture for German.

public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the description of the voice.
Returns the description of the voice.

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

span.span: The specified object.

summary.span: 使用指定的物件來比較語音的欄位，以判斷它們是否包含相同的值。

span.span: Compares the fields of the voice with the specified object to determine whether they contain the same values.

returns.span: 如果兩個 物件的欄位相等，則傳回 ，否則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the fields of the two objects are equal; otherwise returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會採用做為其參數的型別。The method takes a type as its parameter. 如果該物件不是類型，此方法會傳回`False`。If that object is not of the type, the method returns `False`.
